meanings.definition: To groom or trim body hair, especially in the pubic region.
meanings.sent1: He manscaped his body hair before going to the beach.
meanings.sent2: She always manscaped before wearing a swimsuit.
meanings.sent3: After he manscaped, he felt like a new man!
meanings.sent4: Her neatly manscaped appearance was like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: Manscaping is important for personal hygiene and comfort.

meanings.definition: Having groomed or trimmed body hair, especially in the pubic region.
meanings.sent1: The manscaped man felt confident in his appearance.
meanings.sent2: She admired her smooth, manscaped skin after the grooming session.
meanings.sent3: The manscaped area was so tidy, it looked like a little garden!
meanings.sent4: His manscaped look was sharp and well-maintained.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of being manscaped made her feel refreshed and clean.
